sourcesContent:
<template>
  <el-select v-model="selectValue" :disabled="isDisabled" :placeholder="placeholder"
             clearable filterable @change="doChange">
    <el-option v-for="item in options" :key="item.code"
               :disabled="setDisabled(item.code)" :label="hideCode ? item.codename : item.code +':'+item.codename"
               :value="item.code"></el-option>
  </el-select>
</template>

<script>

import {mapGetters} from 'vuex'

export default {
  name: 'Select',
  props: {
    codetype: {
      type: String,
      required: true
    },
    hideCode: {
      type: Boolean,
      required: false,
      default: false
    },
    secondLevel: {
      type: Boolean,
      required: false,
      default: false
    },
    filter: {
      type: String,
      required: false
    },
    disabled: {
      type: Boolean,
      required: false
    },
    value: {
      type: String
    },
    disabledCodeArray: {
      type: Array,
      required: false,
      default: () => {
        return []
      }
    },
    placeholder: {
      type: String,
      required: false,
      default: '请选择'
    }
  },
  mounted() {
    this.buildSelectOptions()
    this.selectValue = this.value
    if (this.disabled) {
      this.isDisabled = this.disabled
    }
  },
  methods: {
    buildSelectOptions() {
      if (!this.secondLevel) {
        this.options = this.ldcodes[this.codetype]
        if (this.filter) {
          this.options = this.filterOptions(this.filter, this.options)
        }
      } else {
        if (this.filter) {
          let secondKey = this.codetype + "." + this.filter
          this.options = this.ldcodes[secondKey]
        }
      }
    },
    doChange(val) {
      this.$emit('change', val)
    },
    setDisabled(code) {
      return !!this._.includes(this.disabledCodeArray, code)
    }
  },
  data() {
    return {
      options: [],
      selectValue: '',
      isDisabled: false
    }
  },
  watch: {
    value(val, oldVal) {
      this.selectValue = val
    },
    selectValue(val, oldVal) {
      if (val != oldVal) {
        this.$emit('input', this.selectValue)
      }
    },
    disabled(val, oldVal) {
      if (val != oldVal) {
        this.isDisabled = val
      }
    },
    filter(val, oldVal) {
      if (val != oldVal) {
        this.selectValue = ''
        this.buildSelectOptions()
      }
    }
  },
  computed: {
    ...mapGetters([
      'ldcodes'
    ])
  }
}
</script>

<style>

</style>
